content:
Chatgpt is likely going to be pulling sources regarding formal meditation and spirituality, which while it can be incremental or helpful, is not directly the realization or the self-inquiry I personally advocate for. 

Self-inquiry is not about watching the watcher or feeling sensations in your body like in formal meditation, it is about getting to the root of thought based self-identity and realizing that we have invented unnecessary beliefs about ourselves and our lives that we have emotional relationship. 

The answer to the question what is "Me" or "I" that has constant and uninterrupted experience every moment of our existence is the realization that causes this connection/relationship to an imagined identity to completely end.
